alert.note: Alert for Brown; Edmunds (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 21 at 8:32PM MDT by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Edmunds and southwestern Brown Counties through 1000 PM CDT... At 931 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Loyalton, or 10 miles southwest of Ipswich, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Ipswich around 940 PM CDT. Pembrook Colony around 945 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Mina. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
